messages.message: React Hook "React.useId" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render.
React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'initializeAuth'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [initializeAuth]

messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'checkUserRole'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [checkUserRole]
